update shop_car_marketing set goodsdata_id = #{goodsdataId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sessionid = #{sessionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, catid = #{catid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemId = #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shopId = #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_url = #{goodsUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_title = #{goodsTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, googs_seller = seilUnit = #{seilunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsUnit = #{goodsunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bulk_volume = #{bulkVolume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_weight = #{totalWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, per_weight = preferential = #{preferential,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deposit_rate = #{depositRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, guid = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, feeprice = #{feeprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_class = #{goodsClass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, extra_freight = #{extraFreight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, source_url = #{sourceUrl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isshipping_promote = #{isshippingPromote,jdbcType=INTEGER}, method_feight = #{methodFeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, price1 = #{price1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, price2 = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, addPrice = #{addprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, isFeight = #{isfeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isBattery = #{isbattery,jdbcType=INTEGER}, aliPosttime = #{aliposttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price4 = #{price4,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, goodsUrlMD5 = #{goodsurlmd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bizPriceDiscount = #{bizpricediscount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spiderPrice = #{spiderprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, priceListSize = #{pricelistsize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comparealiPrice = #{comparealiprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_buy_id = #{groupBuyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, skuid_1688 = #{skuid1688,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isFreeShipProduct = #{isfreeshipproduct,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sampleFee = #{samplefee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sampleMoq = #{samplemoq,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update shop_car_marketing set price1 = #{goodsPrice},googs_price = #{newPrice} where id = #{goodsId} and userid = #{userId}
mapper.select: select a.id,a.itemId as pid,a.googs_price,a.googs_number,a.price1,a.per_weight, b.custom_main_image,b.remotpath,b.wprice,b.isBenchmark,b.bm_flag,b.wholesale_price, b.weight,b.ali_pid,b.ali_img,b.ali_price,b.final_weight,b.catid1, a.goods_title,a.goods_type,a.norm_least,a.googs_img,a.price1,b.ali_name from shop_car_marketing a LEFT JOIN custom_benchmark_ready b on a.itemId = b.pid where a.userid = #{userId}

select a.userid,a.shippingname,date_format(b.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createtime,
'' as last_login_time, b.countryId,b.country,b.grade,b.email from goods_carconfig a LEFT JOIN (select user.id,user.email,user.createtime,user.countryId,user.grade,zone.country from user LEFT JOIN zone on user.countryId = zone.id) b on a.userid = b.id where a.userid = #{userId}
mapper.update: update goods_carconfig set follow_time = now(),follow_admin_id = #{adminId} where userid = #{userId}
mapper.select: select id,country,fedexie,area from zone where id != 43 order by country
